wikitext.*:
'''''pār''''' is the [[Telerin]] word for "fist" (mainly the hand using a tool, not punching).<ref name=PM>{{PM|Dwarves}}, p. 318 (note 7)</ref><ref name=VT>{{VT|47a}}, pp. 8, 22 (note 21)</ref>

==Etymology==

The word is a descendant form of [[Primitive Quendian]] ''[[kwāra|kwāră]]'', deriving from root [[KWAR]].<ref name=PM/><ref name=VT/>

==Cognates==
*[[Quenya]] ''[[quár]]''
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[paur]]''
==See also==
*[[Telperimpar]]
